response:
how can we protect our personal information from being exposed to third parties without our consent?
it is important to be cautious when sharing personal information online and to only provide necessary details when prompted by trusted sources. we should also regularly review and update our privacy settings on social media platforms to ensure that our data remains secure. additionally, we should be aware of the terms and conditions of the websites and apps we use and opt-out if we are not comfortable with how our information is being used.<|endoftext|>
